question: You took your family to a nearby restaurant. You were disappointed with the meal and wish to complain to the manager. Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant.In the letter:explain why you were at the restaurantdescribe the problemswrite about the action you want the manager to take
text: I am writing this letter to drive your attention to a series of problems I faced during my visit to your restaurant.

Let me start by explaining the reason why I went to your restaurant, which was to celebrate my promotion. As the restaurant is close to my house, on Avenue Linton, and I have seen a constant line at the entrance of the restaurant, my family and I decided to have a celebration dinner at your restaurant.

Hoving into the issues, which we experienced many unpleasant situations, there was a considerable delay in providing our table, which I have personally booked ahead. In addition, the children's space was closed for no reason and it was not mentioned when booking a table. And finally, many of your dishes were unavailable due to supply issues.

With respect to the remedial steps, I would appreciate it if you could provide some sort of reasonable compensation in our next visit, as well as I would like to hear your explanation for the above-mentioned problems.
I look forward to hearing from you.
